net.sf.tweety.commons

Class BeliefBaseSampler<S extends BeliefBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.tweety.commons.BeliefBaseSampler<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of belief bases sampled

    public abstract class BeliefBaseSampler<S extends BeliefBase>
extends Object
    This abstract class models a sampler for belief bases. It comprises of a set of sample methods which generates some random belief bases wrt. to a given signature.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_BELIEFBASE_LENGTH
      This constant specifies the default maximum length for sampled belief bases.

      This constant specifies the default minimum length for sampled belief bases.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Signature getSignature()
      Returns the signature of this sampler.
      S randomSample()
      This method randomly samples a single belief base of the given signature with the default maximum belief base length.
      abstract S randomSample(int minLength, int maxLength)
      This method randomly samples a single belief base of the given signature with the given belief base length.
      Collection<S> randomSample(int minLength, int maxLength, int numBeliefBases)
      This method randomly samples a total of "numBeliefBases" of the given signature and maximum belief base length.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_BELIEFBASE_LENGTH

        public static final int DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_BELIEFBASE_LENGTH
        This constant specifies the default maximum length for sampled belief bases. The interpretation of this int depends on the actual type of knowledge representation but should resemble the maximum number of formulas in the belief base;
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MINIMUM_BELIEFBASE_LENGTH

        public static final int DEFAULT_MINIMUM_BELIEFBASE_LENGTH
        This constant specifies the default minimum length for sampled belief bases. The interpretation of this int depends on the actual type of knowledge representation but should resemble the minimum number of formulas in the belief base;
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Creates a new belief base sampler for the given signature.

    • Method Detail

      • randomSample

        public abstract S randomSample(int minLength,
                               int maxLength)
        This method randomly samples a single belief base of the given signature with the given belief base length.
        Parameters:
        minLength - the minimum length of the belief base.
        maxLength - the maximum length of the belief base.
        Returns:
        a single belief base.

      • randomSample

        public S randomSample()
        This method randomly samples a single belief base of the given signature with the default maximum belief base length.
        Returns:
        a single belief base.

      • randomSample

        public Collection<S> randomSample(int minLength,
                                  int maxLength,
                                  int numBeliefBases)
        This method randomly samples a total of "numBeliefBases" of the given signature and maximum belief base length.
        Parameters:
        minLength - the minimum length of the belief base.
        maxLength - the maximum length of the belief base.
        numBeliefBases - the number of belief bases to be sampled.
        Returns:
        a set of belief bases.

      • getSignature

        public Signature getSignature()
        Returns the signature of this sampler.
        Returns:
        the signature of this sampler.
